title: tyAgam gItAsAramE
sahitya:
tyAgam gItAsAramE karma bala tyAgam gItAsAramE


anupallavi

  shOkamAga bandha dondangaLai viDuttu vEgangaLai aDakki yOga yuktanAi vAzhum


caraNam    idaya paramAtmanai eppOdumE eNNi iyaTrum tozhilai avan iniya pUjaiyAip-paNNi
udaya kalyANi pOlE uLLupa shAntamAi uttama bhakti jIvan muktanAi vAzhndiDum
